Man who threatened neighbours with cricket bat tells judge ‘I don’t care’ when sentenced to community work https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-who-threatened-neighbours-with-cricket-bat-tells-judge-i-dont-care-when-sentenced-to-community-work/ 7HVVVMKGYVD65NDOVQRVDF2IFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-who-threatened-neighbours-with-cricket-bat-tells-judge-i-dont-care-when-sentenced-to-community-work/ 7HVVVMKGYVD65NDOVQRVDF2IFY/ Tracy NealHe ran towards them with the bat yelling, 'There will be no peace for you until I’m gone'. Photo / NZME
